mutants.code:
import re

def is_palindrome(input_string):
    input_string = re.sub('\\W+', '', input_string.lower())
    left = 1
    right = len(input_string) - 1
    while left < right:
        if input_string[left] != input_string[right]:
            return False
        left += 1
        right -= 1
    return True
